org.deidentifier.arx
Class ARXAnonymizer

java.lang.Object
  org.deidentifier.arx.ARXAnonymizer

public class ARXAnonymizer
extends java.lang.Object

This class offers several methods to define parameters and execute the ARX algorithm.
